Translations.Text: faqalu abasharan minna wahidan nattabiʿuhu inna idhan lafi dalalin wasuʿurin
a-ul'qiya l-dhik'ru ʿalayhi min baynina bal huwa kadhabun ashirun
inna mur'silu l-naqati fit'natan lahum fa-ir'taqib'hum wa-is'tabir
wanabbi'hum anna l-maa qis'matun baynahum kullu shir'bin muh'tadarun
inna arsalna ʿalayhim sayhatan wahidatan fakanu kahashimi l-muh'taziri
walaqad yassarna l-qur'ana lildhik'ri fahal min muddakirin
inna arsalna ʿalayhim hasiban illa ala lutin najjaynahum bisaharin
niʿ'matan min ʿindina kadhalika najzi man shakara
walaqad rawaduhu ʿan dayfihi fatamasna aʿyunahum fadhuqu ʿadhabi wanudhuri
walaqad yassarna l-qur'ana lildhik'ri fahal min muddakirin
